name: Sky's Fall
description:
Experience a challenging endless faller game! With cute art, dynamic movement (by touch or using gyroscope, as you wish!) and try to achieve the highest score you possibly can reach!

Movement type can be chose in the main menu by tapping the "gyro" button.

Important notice: This is a small game, the content can become repetitive

PS: It's my first published game so constructive feedback is welcomed!
